title: Leaky Tap Repair

process: Replacement of faulty washers or seals

title: Wall Tap Installation
description: Professional installation of wall-mounted taps in bathrooms, kitchens, or outdoor areas with perfect alignment and sealing.
process: Assessment of installation area and water outlet
Marking and drilling for tap fitting
Installation of wall tap with proper sealant
Tightening connections and testing for leaks

description: Realigning loose or misaligned taps for proper installation.

process: Using thread sealant or plumber's tape
